meanings.definition: A name used by a person to access a computer system or online service.
meanings.sent1: Many websites require users to create unique usernames for their accounts.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't log in because I forgot my usernames.
meanings.sent3: The usernames were like secret keys to unlock the online world.
meanings.sent4: In the digital realm, usernames act as gateways to personal information.
meanings.sent5: Remember your usernames to navigate the internet smoothly.

meanings.definition: The unique identifier chosen by an individual to represent themselves on a website or social media platform.
meanings.sent1: She carefully selected her usernames to reflect her personality online.
meanings.sent2: Usernames are often the first thing people notice about your online presence.
meanings.sent3: His usernames were so creative that they made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: In the vast sea of usernames, hers stood out like a shining star.
meanings.sent5: Choose your usernames wisely to make a lasting impression.
